channel.title: Space mission of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the space mission of the day.

item.title: Countdown: Inspiration4 Mission to Space
item.description: Countdown: Inspiration4 Mission to Space is a 2021 American five-part docuseries jointly produced by Netflix and Time Studios to chronicle, in near real-time, the successful SpaceX Inspiration4 orbital mission which occurred in September 2021.
